mapper.select: SELECT MEM_NAME , STU_YEAR , DECODE(MEM_GEN, 'F', '여자', 'M', '남자') AS MEM_GEN , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIRTH, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MEM_BIRTH , C.COLL_NO , COLL_NAME , S.STU_NO , S.MAJOR_CODE , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = (SELECT MAJOR_CODE FROM STUDENT WHERE STU_NO = S.STU_NO )) AS MAJOR_NAME , MINOR_CODE , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = (SELECT MINOR_CODE FROM STUDENT WHERE STU_NO = S.STU_NO )) AS MINOR_NAME , STU_STATUS FROM MEMBER M, STUDENT S, COLLEGE C, DEPT D WHERE M.MEM_NO=S.MEM_NO AND C.COLL_NO=S.COLL_NO AND D.DEPT_ID=S.MAJOR_CODE AND M.MEM_NO=#{memNo}

SELECT CHANGE_ID , TO_CHAR(INSERT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS INSERT_DATE , UPDATE_DATE , STATUS , (SELECT COLL_NAME FROM COLLEGE WHERE COLL_NO = CM.COLL_NO) AS COLL_NAME , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = CM.DEPT_ID) AS DEPT_NAME , (SELECT COLL_NAME FROM COLLEGE WHERE COLL_NO= CM.UP_COLL) AS UP_COLL_NAME , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = CM. UP_DEPT) AS UP_DEPT_NAME FROM CHANGE_MAJOR CM WHERE STU_NO=#{memNo} ORDER BY CHANGE_ID DESC

SELECT CM.CHANGE_ID , C.COLL_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME , CM.STU_NO , M.MEM_NAME , S.STU_YEAR , S.STU_STATUS , (SELECT COLL_NAME FROM COLLEGE WHERE COLL_NO= CM.UP_COLL) AS UP_COLL_NAME , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = CM. UP_DEPT) AS UP_DEPT_NAME , INSERT_DATE FROM CHANGE_MAJOR CM, COLLEGE C, DEPT D, STUDENT S, MEMBER M WHERE CM.STU_NO = S.STU_NO AND CM.STU_NO = M.MEM_NO AND CM.COLL_NO = C.COLL_NO AND CM.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID

SELECT M.MEM_NAME , S.STU_NO , S.STU_YEAR , M.MEM_GEN , CM.COLL_NO , (SELECT DEPT_NAME FROM DEPT WHERE DEPT_ID = CM.DEPT_ID) AS DEPT_NAME , S.MINOR_CODE , M.MEM_EMAIL , M.MEM_BIRTH , M.MEM_TEL , S.STU_STATUS , M.MEM_PHONE , M.POSTCODE , M.MEM_ADDR FROM STUDENT S, MEMBER M, CHANGE_MAJOR CM WHERE CM.STU_NO = S.STU_NO AND CM.STU_NO = M.MEM_NO AND CM.STU_NO = #{stuNo}
